August 10, 2016, Stephen worked with Raul in the same group

I had the pleasure to work with V for over a year at LIBRE. Even though I am in Texas, his reputation at LIBRE for being innovative and thinking outside the box proceeded him. Everyone in the organization was encouraged to reach out to him for new ideas or to get a different perspective on how to do things. Not only was V great at coming up with new initiatives, he delivered results. The team he led consistently set the national standard for on key performance indicators. This can be attributed to his excellent project management skills. I appreciate his leadership and look forward to any opportunity to work with him in the future.

Arron Guerra
Freelance Media Buyer at Arizona Department of Administration
August 9, 2016, Stephen was a client of Arron’s

I have worked in the campaign and elections business for a long time as a media buyer. I have also known V since he first got involved in government affairs six years ago. In that time I have seen him excel in various roles and organizations. The passion for what he does is contagious, and this makes him a great leader. Also his ability to solve problems before the rest of us even see a problem coming is remarkable. His latest venture with a AssureVote is no different. It will be exciting to see how his technology improves and shapes campaigns and elections in the years to come."

Kyle McEuen
President, COO at ProfitKeeper
September 14, 2015, Stephen worked with Kyle but at different companies

Kyle is one of the very first people I met when I moved to Arizona 8 years ago. Kyle's passion and integrity is nothing short of remarkable. When he commits to doing something you can guarantee that it will get done and done right the first time! He's a true professional, and if you need an advisor or want to grow your company, Kyle can make that happen. Guaranteed.

Michael Nunes
Founder & Chief of Hustle at PÊK Projects Events & Marketing
September 14, 2015, Stephen was a client of Michael’s

Working with Michael was a great pleasure. He's ability to follow through on his commitments in timely manner is what impressed me most about him.  During our event in downtown Phoenix there were challenges with the A/V system, which was crucial for our presentation. Instead of apologizing for the problem, he quickly acted and came up with a creative solution to make sure we had what we needed. When you work with Michael you get someone that really does "go the extra mile" for you.

summary: The nexus of Nomad and Renaissance Man. 1.5x removed from connections to anyone in Arizona.  Professionally done few different things, all at the highest level and with excellence.  Always learning and challenging the status quo. Certified nonconformist.Color within the lines? Can't do it. Fit in a box? There is no box.  Nothing is more important than the right kind of execution-- getting it right usually isn't conventional. -EQ > IQ, always -Know your "one thing."-0% complaining
name: Stephen Viramontes
title: 3x Entrepreneur | Product Owner/Manager | Passionate about AZ's tech workforce, community & education | #yesphx
